common_use_cases: Deep freezer / water cooler / air cooler support
Home mainline protection (flat / multi-room load variants)
Digital UPS support (mentioned with select use-cases)

kva_span_across_brochure.note: Different models cover different appliances and loads.

input_voltage_range_span_across_brochure.note: Model-dependent voltage ranges across AC + mainline variants.

medium_current_appliances_examples: 4 Amp: refrigerator up to 600L / deep freezer / water cooler / air cooler / 1000VA digital UPS
mainline_and_multi_appliance_examples: 6 Amp: refrigerator + deep freezer + water cooler/air cooler + 0.5 ton AC + digital UPS + e-rickshaw battery charging
General purpose mainline (flat load combos with lights, bulbs, fans, TV, washing machine)
Higher-load home combos including cooler and single-phase submersible pump (as listed in brochure)

compliance_and_markings.approval_marking: USA ANSY Y32.2 approved (as shown on brochure cover)
